forum.name: T4D1 Discussion: Share Your Diagnostic Assessment Experiences
forum.intro:
Your Responses to the Learner Questionnaire Diagnostic Testing Video

Based on the video you viewed, and your own experiences with similar diagnostic assessment please post your responses to the following questions:

  • Have you used a questionnaire in this way before?  If so, what was your experience using it? If not, how might you incorporate such a diagnostic tool into your instruction?
  • Please share about a diagnostic assessment activity – either spontaneous or as a planned activity – that you have used in your classroom.  How well did it provide you with necessary information to guide instruction?

After you post, please take time to review others posted responses and post at least one reply in response.

Once You Have Completed Your Post:

Click on Intro-Assessment-ABE link at the top (or at left under "my Courses") to return to the Course Outline and access the next course activity.
